name: Canvas element
description: A collection of methods for getting and setting various properties of the canvas element.

methods.name: getCanvas
methods.description: Get the canvas element.

methods.name: setDensity
methods.description: Set the canvas pixel density.

methods.name: getDensity
methods.description: Get the canvas pixel density.

methods.name: setSize
methods.description: Set the canvas dimensions.

methods.name: getSize
methods.description: Get the canvas dimensions.

methods.name: setWidth
methods.description: Set the canvas width.

methods.name: getWidth
methods.description: Get the canvas width.

methods.name: setHeight
methods.description: Set the canvas height.

methods.name: getHeight
methods.description: Get the canvas height.

methods.name: getBoundingClientRect
methods.description: Get the canvas size & position on screen.

name: Context
description: 'A collection of methods for retrieving a canvas context or information about the context.

methods.name: getContext
methods.description: Get the standard canvas context (used for drawing).

methods.name: getCurrentContext
methods.description: Get canvas context used by Canvasimo (2d).

methods.name: getCurrentContextType
methods.description: Get the context type used by Canvasimo ('2d', 'webgl', etc).

methods.name: getContextAttributes
methods.description: Get the context attributes used.

name: Solid Shapes
description:
A collection of methods for plotting or drawing solid shapes -
those that create a new shape when invoked, and are self closing.

methods.name: plotRect
methods.description: Plot a rectangle that can then have a fill or stroke applied to it.

methods.name: strokeRect
methods.description: Plot a rectangle and apply a stroke to it.

methods.name: fillRect
methods.description: Plot a rectangle and apply a fill to it.

methods.name: plotRoundedRect
methods.description: Plot a rounded rectangle that can then have a fill or stroke applied to it.

methods.name: strokeRoundedRect
methods.description: Plot a rounded rectangle and apply a stroke to it.

methods.name: fillRoundedRect
methods.description: Plot a rounded rectangle and apply a fill to it.

methods.name: plotCircle
methods.description: Plot a circle that can then have a stroke or fill applied to it.

methods.name: strokeCircle
methods.description: Plot a circle and apply a stroke to it.

methods.name: fillCircle
methods.description: Plot a circle and apply a fill to it.

methods.name: plotPoly
methods.description: Plot a polygon that can then have a stroke or fill applied to it.

methods.name: strokePoly
methods.description: Plot a polygon and apply a stoke to it.

methods.name: fillPoly
methods.description: Plot a polygon and apply a fill to it.

methods.name: plotStar
methods.description: Plot a star that can then have a stroke or fill applied to it.

methods.name: strokeStar
methods.description: Plot a star and apply a stoke to it.

methods.name: fillStar
methods.description: Plot a star and apply a fill to it.

methods.name: plotBurst
methods.description: Plot a burst that can then have a stroke or fill applied to it.

methods.name: strokeBurst
methods.description: Plot a burst and apply a stoke to it.

methods.name: fillBurst
methods.description: Plot a burst and apply a fill to it.

methods.name: plotPixel
methods.description: Plot a single pixel that can then have a stroke or fill applied to it.

methods.name: strokePixel
methods.description: Plot a single pixel and apply a stroke to it.

methods.name: fillPixel
methods.description: Plot a single pixel and apply a fill to it.

methods.name: plotClosedPath
methods.description: Plot a closed path that can then have a stroke or fill applied to it.

typeAliases.name: Points
typeAliases.alias: Array<{x: number, y: number}> | Array<[number, number]> | number[]

methods.name: strokeClosedPath
methods.description: Plot a closed path and apply a stroke to it.

typeAliases.name: Points
typeAliases.alias: Array<{x: number, y: number}> | Array<[number, number]> | number[]

methods.name: fillClosedPath
methods.description: Plot a closed path and apply a fill to it.

typeAliases.name: Points
typeAliases.alias: Array<{x: number, y: number}> | Array<[number, number]> | number[]

name: Open Shapes
description:
A collection of methods for plotting or drawing open shapes -
those that create a new shape when invoked, but are not self closing.

methods.name: plotLine
methods.description: Plot a line that can then have a stroke or fill applied to it.

methods.name: strokeLine
methods.description: Plot a line and apply a stroke to it.

methods.name: plotLength
methods.description: Plot a line, by length & angle, that can then have a stroke or fill applied to it.

methods.name: strokeLength
methods.description: Plot a line, by length & angle, and apply a stroke to it.

methods.name: plotPath
methods.description: Plot a path, that is not self closing, that can have a stroke or fill applied to it.

typeAliases.name: Points
typeAliases.alias: Array<{x: number, y: number}> | Array<[number, number]> | number[]

methods.name: strokePath
methods.description: Plot a path, that is not self closing, and apply a stroke to it.

typeAliases.name: Points
typeAliases.alias: Array<{x: number, y: number}> | Array<[number, number]> | number[]

methods.name: fillPath
methods.description: Plot a path, that is not self closing, and apply a fill to it.

typeAliases.name: Points
typeAliases.alias: Array<{x: number, y: number}> | Array<[number, number]> | number[]

name: Paths
description:
A collection of methods for plotting or drawing paths -
shapes that can be connected to create more complex shapes.

methods.name: plotArc
methods.description: Plot an arc that can have a stroke or fill applied to it.

methods.name: strokeArc
methods.description: Plot an arc and apply a stroke to it.

methods.name: fillArc
methods.description: Plot an arc and apply a fill to it.

methods.name: plotEllipse
methods.description: Plot an ellipse that can then have a stroke or fill applied to it.

methods.name: strokeEllipse
methods.description: Plot an ellipse and apply a stroke to it.

methods.name: fillEllipse
methods.description: Plot an ellipse and apply a fill to it.

name: Text
description:
A collection of methods for drawing text,
and getting and setting properties related to text rendering.

methods.name: strokeText
methods.description: Draw a text with a stroke.

methods.name: fillText
methods.description: Draw a text with a fill.

methods.name: strokeTextMultiline
methods.description:
Draw text with a stroke, wrapped at newlines and automatically wrapped if the text exceeds the maxWidth.
If no maxWidth is specified text will only wrap at newlines (wordBreak is ignore).
Words will not break by default (normal) and therefore may overflow.
break-all will break words wherever possible, and break-word will only break words if there is not enough room.
The lineHeight parameter is a multiplier for the font size, and defaults to 1.

methods.name: fillTextMultiline
methods.description:
Draw text with a fill, wrapped at newlines and automatically wrapped if the text exceeds the maxWidth.
If no maxWidth is specified text will only wrap at newlines (wordBreak is ignore).
Words will not break by default (normal) and therefore may overflow.
break-all will break words wherever possible, and break-word will only break words if there is not enough room.
The lineHeight parameter is a multiplier for the font size, and defaults to 1.

methods.name: getTextSize
methods.description: Get information about the size text will be drawn.

methods.name: setTextAlign
methods.description: Set the horizontal text alignment.

methods.name: getTextAlign
methods.description: Get the horizontal text alignment.

methods.name: setTextBaseline
methods.description: Set the vertical text alignment.

methods.name: getTextBaseline
methods.description: Get the vertical text alignment.

name: Fonts
description: A collection of methods for getting and setting font styles and variations.

methods.name: setFont
methods.description: Set the font to use.

methods.name: getFont
methods.description:
Get the font that is being used.
This returns the exact CanvasRenderingContext2D.font string.

methods.name: setFontFamily
methods.description: Set the font family to use.

methods.name: getFontFamily
methods.description: Get the font that is being used.

methods.name: setFontSize
methods.description: Set the font size to use.

methods.name: getFontSize
methods.description:
Get the font size that is being used.
Returns null if using a special font e.g. caption, icon, menu.

methods.name: setFontStyle
methods.description: Set the font style to use.

methods.name: getFontStyle
methods.description:
Get the font style that is being used.
Returns null if using a special font e.g. caption, icon, menu.

methods.name: setFontVariant
methods.description: Set the font variant to use.

methods.name: getFontVariant
methods.description:
Get the font variant that is being used.
Returns null if using a special font e.g. caption, icon, menu.

methods.name: setFontWeight
methods.description: Set the font weight to use.

methods.name: getFontWeight
methods.description:
Get the font weight that is being used.
Returns null if using a special font e.g. caption, icon, menu.

name: Stroke Styles
description:
A collection of methods for getting and setting stroke styles,
and applying strokes to existing shapes.

methods.name: stroke
methods.description: Apply a stroke to the current shape.

methods.name: setStroke
methods.description: Set the stroke style to use.

methods.name: getStroke
methods.description: Get the stroke style that is being used.

methods.name: setStrokeCap
methods.description: Set the stroke cap to use.

methods.name: getStrokeCap
methods.description: Get the stroke cap that is being used.

methods.name: setStrokeDash
methods.description: Set the stroke dash to use.

methods.name: getStrokeDash
methods.description: Get the stroke dash that is being used.

methods.name: setStrokeDashOffset
methods.description: Set the stroke dash offset to use.

methods.name: getStrokeDashOffset
methods.description: Get the stroke dash offset that is being used.

methods.name: setStrokeJoin
methods.description: Set the stroke join to use.

methods.name: getStrokeJoin
methods.description: Get the stroke join that is being used.

methods.name: setStrokeWidth
methods.description: Set the stroke width to use.

methods.name: getStrokeWidth
methods.description: Get the stroke width that is being used.

methods.name: setMiterLimit
methods.description: Set the miter limit to use.

methods.name: getMiterLimit
methods.description: Get the miter limit that is being used.

name: Fill styles
description:
A collection of methods for getting and setting fill styles,
and applying fills to existing shapes.

methods.name: fill
methods.description: Apply a fill to the current shape.

methods.name: fillCanvas
methods.description: Apply a fill to the entire canvas area.

methods.name: clearCanvas
methods.description: Clear the entire canvas area

methods.name: clearRect
methods.description: Clear a rectangular area of the canvas.

methods.name: setFill
methods.description: Set the fill to use.

methods.name: getFill
methods.description: Get the fill that is being used.

methods.name: createLinearGradient
methods.description: Create a linear gradient to use as a fill.

methods.name: createRadialGradient
methods.description: Create a radial gradient to use as a fill.

methods.name: createPattern
methods.description: Create a pattern to be used as a fill.

methods.name: drawImage
methods.description:
Draw an image to the canvas.
If the second position / size arguments are supplied, the first will be used for cropping the image,
and the second for the position and size it will be drawn.

name: Image Data
description: A collection of methods for creating, putting, or getting image data about the canvas.

methods.name: getDataURL
methods.description: Get a data URL of the current canvas state.

methods.name: createImageData
methods.description:
Create image data with either the width and height specified,
or with the width and height of a the image data supplied.

methods.name: getImageData
methods.description: Get the image data from an area of the canvas.

methods.name: putImageData
methods.description: Draw image data onto the canvas.

methods.name: getPixelData
methods.description: Get image data about a specific pixel.

methods.name: getPixelColor
methods.description: Get the color of a specific pixel.

name: Color Helpers
description: A collection of methods to help with creating color strings.

methods.name: createHSL
methods.description: Create an HSL color string from the given values.

methods.name: createHSLA
methods.description: Create an HSLA color string from the given values.

methods.name: createRGB
methods.description: Create an RGB color string from the given values.

methods.name: createRGBA
methods.description: Create an RGBA color string from the given values.

methods.name: getHSLFromHSLA
methods.description: Return an HSL color string from the given HSLA color string.

methods.name: getRGBFromRGBA
methods.description: Return an RGB color string from the given RGBA color string.

name: Converting Sizes
description: A collection of methods to help with calculating and converting sizes, and distances.

methods.name: getFractionFromPercent
methods.description: Get a fraction from the provided percent value e.g. 80 returns 0.8.

methods.name: getPercentFromFraction
methods.description: Get a percent from the provided fraction value e.g. 0.7 returns 70.

methods.name: getFractionOfWidth
methods.description:
Returns the actual value of a fraction of the canvas width e.g.
a canvas with a width of 200 returns 100 if the provided value is 0.5.

methods.name: getFractionOfHeight
methods.description:
Returns the actual value of a fraction of the canvas height e.g.
a canvas with a height of 100 returns 20 if the provided value is 0.2.

methods.name: getPercentOfWidth
methods.description:
Returns the actual value of a percentage of the canvas width e.g.
a canvas with a width of 200 returns 100 if the provided value is 50.

methods.name: getPercentOfHeight
methods.description:
Returns the actual value of a percentage of the canvas height e.g.
a canvas with a height of 100 returns 20 if the provided value is 20.

methods.name: getDistance
methods.description: Returns the distance between 2 points.

name: Converting Angles
description: A collection of methods to help with calculating and converting angles.

methods.name: getRadiansFromDegrees
methods.description: Get a radian value from the provided degrees e.g. 90 returns 1.5708.

methods.name: getDegreesFromRadians
methods.description: Get a degree value from the provided radians e.g. 3.14159 returns 180.

methods.name: getAngle
methods.description: Get the angle (in radians) between 2 or 3 points.

name: Path Plotting
description: A collection of methods for path drawing.

methods.name: beginPath
methods.description: Begin a new path (shape).

methods.name: closePath
methods.description: Close the current path (shape).

methods.name: moveTo
methods.description: Move the starting point of a the next sub-path.

methods.name: lineTo
methods.description: Connect the last point to the provided coordinates.

methods.name: arcTo
methods.description: Arc from one point to another.

methods.name: bezierCurveTo
methods.description: Connect the last point to the provided coordinates with a bezier curve (2 control points).

methods.name: quadraticCurveTo
methods.description: Connect the last point to the provided coordinates with a quadratic curve (1 control point).

name: Canvas State
description: A collection of methods to save, restore, or transform the canvas state.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Push the current state of the canvas into a stack that can later be restored.

methods.name: restore
methods.description: Restore the most recent state of the canvas that was saved.

methods.name: rotate
methods.description: Add rotation (in radians) to the transform matrix so that shapes can be drawn at an angle.

methods.name: scale
methods.description: Scale the transform matrix so that shapes can be drawn at the provided scale.

methods.name: translate
methods.description: Move the canvas origin.

methods.name: transform
methods.description: Multiply the current transformation with the provided matrix.

methods.name: setTransform
methods.description: Replace the current transformation with the provided matrix.

methods.name: resetTransform
methods.description: Replace the current transformation with the default matrix: [1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0].

methods.name: clip
methods.description: Use the current path as a clipping path.

methods.name: setOpacity
methods.description: Set the opacity to use for drawing.

methods.name: getOpacity
methods.description: Get the opacity that is being used.

methods.name: setCompositeOperation
methods.description: Set the composite operation to use for drawing.

methods.name: getCompositeOperation
methods.description: Get the composite operation that is being used.

methods.name: setImageSmoothingEnabled
methods.description: Set whether image smoothing should be used.

methods.name: getImageSmoothingEnabled
methods.description: Get whether image smoothing is being used.

methods.name: setShadowBlur
methods.description: Set how blurry shadows are.

methods.name: getShadowBlur
methods.description: Get the value of how blurry shadows are.

methods.name: setShadowColor
methods.description: Set the color to be used for shadows.

methods.name: getShadowColor
methods.description: Get the color being used for shadows.

methods.name: setShadowOffsetX
methods.description: Set how horizontally offset shadows should be.

methods.name: getShadowOffsetX
methods.description: Get the value of how horizontally offset shadows should be.

methods.name: setShadowOffsetY
methods.description: Set how vertically offset shadows should be.

methods.name: getShadowOffsetY
methods.description: Get the value of how vertically offset shadows should be.

methods.name: tap
methods.description: Break out of the method chain and execute a callback.

methods.name: repeat
methods.description:
Break out of the method chain and execute a callback with values between start and end,
increasing / decreasing by step (start defaults to 0, step defaults to 1).
You may return false from the callback at any point to stop at the current iteration.

methods.name: forEach
methods.description:
Break out of the method chain and loop over the given array, object or string,
calling the callback with the value & key / index.
You may return false from the callback at any point to stop at the current iteration.

methods.name: constrain
methods.description: Constrain a number between a minimum and maximum value.

methods.name: map
methods.description: Map a value from one range to another e.g. mapping 0.5 from 0-1 to 0-10 returns 5.

methods.name: drawFocusIfNeeded
methods.description:
Draw a focus ring around the current path, or the path supplied,
if the element supplied has focus.

methods.name: isPointInPath
methods.description: Returns whether the given point is within the current or given path.

methods.name: isPointInStroke
methods.description:
Returns whether the given point is within the area contained by applying
a stroke to the current or given path.

methods.name: getVersion
methods.description: Return the current version of Canvasimo (and log to console if logInfo parameter is true)
